Method Detail

addAddress

public void addAddress(Address address)
Store a new address into the address book.

Parameters:
address - The Address object to be added to the list

findByAny

public Address findByAny(String text)
Find the first address that contains the given text in ANY field.

Parameters:
text - The text to search for.
Returns:
The address object that contains the given text in any field. The method should return null if the text cannot be found.

findByName

public Address findByName(String name)
Find the address of the person with the given name.

Parameters:
name - The name of the person whose address we want.
Returns:
The address object with the details of the person with the given name. The method should return null if the person could not be found.

getAddresses

public ArrayList<Address> getAddresses()
Get the ArrayList of addresses.

Returns:
The ArrayList containing the addresses.

getNumberOfAddresses

public int getNumberOfAddresses()
Find out the number of addresses in the address book

Returns:
The number of addresses in the address book

toString

public String toString()
Format a the address book ready for printing.

Overrides:
toString in class Object
Returns:
a string containing all of the addresses in the address book separated by newlines.

updatePhoneByName

public boolean updatePhoneByName(String name,
                                 String newPhone)
Store a new phone number for the address with the given name.

Parameters:
name - The name to search for. The first address with that name will be updated with the given phone number. Nothing will happen if the name is not found.
newPhone - The new phone number to replace the old one.
Returns:
Will return true if it found an address to update. Will return false if the name could not be found in the address book.
